title: The Homeschoolers
description: After an embarrassing bout of in-school diarrhea leaves Christina Begoni a bully's primary target, she flees public school for her only other option: a holy-rolling homeschool group. With her redneck tormentor and mustachioed younger brother in tote, Christina joins gorgeous homeschooler, David and his sickeningly sweet sister, Sunny on a gripping and often hilarious adventure on the Mississippi River.(Copied from Amazon)
author: Henry Circle
